00080 #define N_DEVICEINFO_SETTING_PANID              0x0001u
00081 #define N_DEVICEINFO_SETTING_EXTPANID           0x0002u
00082 #define N_DEVICEINFO_SETTING_CHANNEL            0x0004u
00083 #define N_DEVICEINFO_SETTING_NETWORK_ADDRESS    0x0008u
00084 #define N_DEVICEINFO_SETTING_NETWORK_UPDATE_ID  0x0010u
00085 #define N_DEVICEINFO_SETTING_FACTORY_NEW        0x0020u
00086 #define N_DEVICEINFO_SETTING_TRUSTCENTERMODE    0x0040u
00087 #define N_DEVICEINFO_SETTING_DURING_INIT        0x8000u
00088 
00089 // ZigBee Channels (for creating a channelmask)
00090 #define ZB_CHANNEL_26   0x04000000uL  // 0x1A
00091 #define ZB_CHANNEL_25   0x02000000uL  // 0x19
00092 #define ZB_CHANNEL_24   0x01000000uL  // 0x18
00093 #define ZB_CHANNEL_23   0x00800000uL  // 0x17
00094 #define ZB_CHANNEL_22   0x00400000uL  // 0x16
00095 #define ZB_CHANNEL_21   0x00200000uL  // 0x15
00096 #define ZB_CHANNEL_20   0x00100000uL  // 0x14
00097 #define ZB_CHANNEL_19   0x00080000uL  // 0x13
00098 #define ZB_CHANNEL_18   0x00040000uL  // 0x12
00099 #define ZB_CHANNEL_17   0x00020000uL  // 0x11
00100 #define ZB_CHANNEL_16   0x00010000uL  // 0x10
00101 #define ZB_CHANNEL_15   0x00008000uL  // 0x0F
00102 #define ZB_CHANNEL_14   0x00004000uL  // 0x0E
00103 #define ZB_CHANNEL_13   0x00002000uL  // 0x0D
00104 #define ZB_CHANNEL_12   0x00001000uL  // 0x0C
00105 #define ZB_CHANNEL_11   0x00000800uL  // 0x0B
00106 
00107 #define LOWEST_ZIGBEE_CHANNEL               11u
00108 #define HIGHEST_ZIGBEE_CHANNEL              26u
00109 
00110 #define BEACON_AMOUNT 3u
00111 
00112 #define LOWEST_ZIGBEE_CHANNEL_MASK          0x00000800uL
00113 #define VALID_ZIGBEE_CHANNEL_MASK           0x07FFF800uL
00114 
00115 #define ZLL_PRIMARY_CHANNELMASK             (ZB_CHANNEL_11 | ZB_CHANNEL_15 | ZB_CHANNEL_20 | ZB_CHANNEL_25)
00116 #define ZLL_SECONDARY_CHANNELMASK           (VALID_ZIGBEE_CHANNEL_MASK & (~ZLL_PRIMARY_CHANNELMASK))
